documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - CESM Low Warming runs(d651025)

metadata.documentation:
Community Earth System Model Low Warming runs containing the following frequencies and components
CESM Low Warming Atmosphere Post Processed Monthly Averages CESM Low Warming Land Post Processed Monthly Averages CESM Low Warming Ice Post Processed Monthly Averages CESM Low Warming Ocean Post Processed Monthly Averages CESM Low Warming River Post Processed Monthly Averages CESM Low Warming Ocean Post Processed Annual Averages CESM Low Warming Atmosphere Post Processed Daily Averages CESM Low Warming Ice Post Processed Daily Averages CESM Low Warming Land Post Processed Daily Averages CESM Low Warming Ocean Post Processed Daily Averages CESM Low Warming River Post Processed Daily Averages CESM Low Warming Atmosphere Post Processed Daily Instantaneous Data CESM Low Warming Atmosphere Post Processed 6-Hourly Instantaneous Data CESM Low Warming Atmosphere Post Processed 3-Hourly Instantaneous Data CESM Low Warming Atmosphere Post Processed 3-Hourly Averages
